metadata.title: CVE-2012-0319 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The file-management system in Movable Type before 4.38, 5.0x before 5.07,and 5.1x before 5.13 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrarycommands by leveraging the file-upload feature, related to an "OS CommandInjection" issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0319` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

movabletype-opensource - 5.1.4+dfsg-1
movabletype-plugin-core - 5.1.4+dfsg-1
movabletype-plugin-zemanta - 5.1.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: movabletype-opensource package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.1.4+dfsg-1').
